FuncDef: This command defines the default action to be applied to packets not matching any entry in this ACL filter policy or to packets for that match a PBF/PBR filter entry for which the PBF/PBR target is down andpbr-down-action-overrideper-entry is set tofilter-default-action.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the default action is to drop a packet.
Specifies the default action is to forward a packet.
